description: Further details for income from Self Assessment

sa.description: Self Assessment tax return history for the requested time period.

taxYear.description: The tax year in the format YYYY.

busStartDate.description: The start date for the business.

busEndDate.description: The end date for the business.

caseStartDate.description: The start date for the case.

businessDescription.description: A description of the main business activity relating to the Self Assessment tax return.

income.description: Income for a requested time period.

selfAssessment.description: The income from Self Assessment for the requested time period. Amount in the range of: -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

trusts.description: The income from trusts for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

allEmployments.description: The income from employments for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

selfEmployment.description: The income from employments for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

partnerships.description: The income from partnerships for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

ukProperty.description: The income from UK property for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

foreign.description: The foreign income for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

foreignDivs.description: The income from foreign dividends for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

ukInterest.description: The UK interest for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

ukDivsAndInterest.description: The UK interests and dividends for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

pensions.description: The income from pensions for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

other.description: Other income for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

lifePolicies.description: The income from life policies for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

shares.description: The income from shares for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

totalTaxPaid.description: The total tax paid for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

totalNIC.description: The total National Insurance contributions paid for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

turnover.description: Turnover for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

otherBusIncome.description: Other business income for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

tradingIncomeAllowance.description: The trading income allowance for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

deducts.description: Deductions for the requested time period.

totalBusExpenses.description: The total business expenses for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.

totalDisallowBusExp.description: The total disallowed business expenses for the requested time period. Amount in the range -99999999999.99 to 99999999999.99.
